summary:
On March 20, 2013 Veterans A and B were seen by the same VA Provider in back to back appointments. When Veteran A left the clinic he was given his After Visit Summary as well as the summary for Veteran B. The Veteran discovered this the next day and notified the clinic of the error. He will be mailing the document back to the clinic.
The summary contained Veteran B_s full name, that appointment date, the vitals recorded at that visit (blood pressure, weight, and pain level), and 6 current medications including dosage. No SSN, birth date, or contact information was disclosed.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
